scripts.test: npm run test-units && npm run test-core
scripts.test-units: npm run build-test-files && karma start unit_tests.conf
scripts.test-core: npm run build && karma start core_tests.conf
scripts.build: npm run build-static-files && npm run build-remote-files && npm run build-extra-files && npm run rebuild
scripts.build-framework-files: npm run build-external-frameworks && npm run build-internal-frameworks
scripts.rebuild: npm run build-framework-files && npm run build-static-files && npm run build-cwc-files
scripts.fastbuild: npm run build && npm run launch-win
scripts.launch-win: echo Launching app. Please wait ... && "C:\Program Files (x86)\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe" --load-and-launch-app=%CD%\genfiles --enable-logging --v=1 --no-first-run
scripts.clean: echo Cleaning up. Please wait ... && npm prune && rimraf genfiles/*
scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.update: ncu -u -a && npm install && npm update -a && npm test
